text: Rainbow is a lost The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Rainbow 1921 silent film drama directed by Edward José and starring Alice Calhoun. It was produced and distributed by the Vitagraph Company of America. The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:Rainbow ==Cast== *Alice Calhoun - Rainbow Halliday *Jack Roach - George Standish *William J. title: Rainbow (1921 film)
